name: Triceratops
description: A massive, herbivorous dinosaur known for its three facial horns and large, bony frill, resembling a prehistoric beast standing as tall as an elephant.
memorable: Known for its charging attacks and ability to trample smaller foes, making it a dominant presence in its environment.
goals: Grazes on vegetation and protects itself and its herd from predators.
relations: May coexist with other large herbivores; serves as prey for larger predators such as carnivorous dinosaurs.
environment: Commonly found in grasslands and jungles.
strengths: Exceptional Strength score allows for powerful melee attacks; hardy nature against critical hits enhances survivability.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and lack of social skills make it vulnerable to tactical movements that target agility.
attacks: Utilizes its 'Gore' attack to deliver piercing damage and can follow up with a 'Stomp' against prone targets.
most_powerful_ability: Trampling Charge allows it to knock targets prone and follow up with additional attacks.
senses: Passive perception of 10, indicating some awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Average skills; doesn’t possess any noteworthy skill proficiencies.
additional_information: Capable of delivering devastating melee damage with its charge and gore attacks.
Can emit a loud warning call to intimidate nearby creatures.
Can ignore additional damage from critical hits.
Has a large body size allowing it to trample through smaller creatures.
Known to be protective of its herd.
test_queries: massive dinosaur with three facial horns
charging dinosaur that protects its herd
large dinosaur that grazes on vegetation
imposing creature that can trample foes
